entry.title: I Wrote a Book!
entry.content:
A story 19 years in the making; a life retold through pictures and rhyming words. It’s:

The Tale of Shail.

Go read it here.

entry.title: Hello World!
entry.content:
After months of deciding how to go about a personal website I’ve finally settled on some kind of blog-portfolio hybrid.

Exciting.

Hopefully I’ll be able to update this blog semi-frequently with whatever I’m currently working on or whatever I feel the need to share with the world.
